name: Army Survival Hero
description:
Epic fight with rivals in dungeon US Army Survival Hero adventure. You are a trained army battlefield special force hero of the tactical team. You are armed with machine guns, sniper rifles, and grenades and you will complete a secret mission in the shooting game to eliminate the rival forces that obstruct the peace in this WW2 game. US Army Survival Hero is the best WW2 Games that enters the game to show off your shooting skills as an elite force using your guns and bullets to destroy your enemies, but be aware of the time in this WW2 game. Once you start shooting, your gunshots draw the enemy's attention and let the enemy know where you are, so be prepared to destroy all enemies in the shortest time in this hero survival game. Apart from world war II and world war iii games, this is a hell of thrilling action and full of epic adventurous with impossible survival hero in the extreme dungeon war zone. Show no mercy on those who retaliate against you in this hero survival battle This unique gameplay is set in a world war, displays the high quality of graphics and detailed designing. Players can enjoy realistic 3D sound-effects to enjoy the game by downloading and playing this US Army Survival Hero game.

Game Features
Smooth and intuitive controls
Thrilling and challenging Missions
Use Punch, Kicks & Powers to Destroy Enemies
High-Quality​ 3D Dungeon & Desert Environment
Fight with Security Guards Wing in Army Prisoner Jail
